title: Does bad weather affect ping?
body: So we have a blizzard going on in the East Coast area and my ping spikes about 1-4k. It has lost me so much games today and its just unbearable.

replies.body:
Hey Heneroso,

Weather can affect ping, as the internet lines you connect through to get to the servers could be knocked out or damaged, causing your signal to take an in-optimal or constantly shifting route!
guess that means when ever it's not sunny dont play rank ._.{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
